pageContent: Background: We performed a longitudinal survey of health related quality of life (HRQOL) after radical retropubic prostatectomy (RP) in Japanese men with localized prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
From bad to worse: comorbidity severity and quality of life after treatment for early-stage prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/20838413/
